name: Average Streamers Day
description:
Thanks for playing!

I tried to keep music streamer friendly (and legal lol)

Nothing but love baby, anyways, here's the list of songs and videos used:
(refrain from looking if you want to "experience" them yourselves) 

Music
_____________________________________
Count What You Have Now by Vantage (8-bit Remix)
by Slaw

Bae City Rollaz, I Want Cha Back, I Can Tell 
by Yung Bae

Love, Love, Love; She Draws the Sun Down
Sunday Seaside; Want You Back
We are The Lights (feat. LaVera)
1986 Tokyo_tears; Be (bop) Boogie!
by Android Apartment

Crystal Dolphin
by Engelwood

Paris City Jazz
by Bellaire

Mega Man II by Nintendo (edit)
by Johan Agebjörn (youtube vid, idk if it's the artists)

Luigi's Mansion's Training Theme
by Kazumi Totaka and Shinobu Tanaka

Athletic Theme - Super Mario World
by Elder-God-King Koji Kondo

Realize
by Blu-Swing

Rip n' Tear (DOOM 2016 OST)
By God-King Mick Gordon

Videos
____________________________________
PEPSI MAN (lol)
by MowtenDoo

سحلية الرقص

Known Issues

  • Still tweaking the 'endgame' portion, but it's to a point where I feel it's decent.
  • 'Life Span' needs tweaking
  • 'Best' Shows up on credits scene
  • Peter turns too slowly at the end of loop
  • Going out of the tab (maybe window) messes up the timing of process, me thinks

This item is not for sale (music reasons).
